experience.title: Projects

aboutSection.title: About Me
copy: ✔ Hello, my name is Brayan and I am a computer engineer and web developer.
✔ I have been passionate about technology since I was a child because it allows us to create beyond our imagination.

✔ I have collaborated with communities with few resources and I have helped them with tools to be better in their work, work that has filled me with satisfaction for helping people through technology, as well as in a large company where they provide support to other corporations.
